Emerging Markets Investment Grade Yields



As of 26 October 2023
Sovereign: JPM EMBI Global Diversified IG; Corporate: JPM CEMBI Broad Diversified IG
Source: Lazard, JP Morgan

Do Rising US Interest Rates Offer Opportunities in EM?


Tuesday, October 31, 1:00PM eT


Rising US interest rates--and soaring Treasury yields--have done their part to rattle global economics. As the environment settles, we expect growth differentials to shift, creating a more positive backdrop for emerging markets debt and interesting investment opportunities for the asset class across the capital structure.Rising US interest rates--and soaring Treasury yields--have done their part to rattle global economics. As the environment settles, we expect growth differentials to shift, creating a more positive backdrop for emerging markets debt and interesting investment opportunities for the asset class across the capital structure.


•  Lazard US Offshore Fund Offerings
